name: Flaremon
description: A fiery Gmon that can ignite its foes with bursts of flame.

name: Aqualis
description: A water Gmon that uses a powerful shield and boasts strong defense.

name: Voltmon
description: Voltmon is quick on its feet and can zap enemies with electric shocks.

name: Floramon
description: Floramon harnesses the power of nature, with sturdy defense and quick strikes.

name: Psychomon
description: With psychic abilities, Psychomon manipulates foesâ€™ minds, making them question their next move.

name: Glaciomon
description: Glaciomon freezes anything in its path, with the potential to freeze enemies in battle.

name: Umbromon
description: Umbromon thrives in the shadows, with high offensive capabilities and evasive skills.

name: Steamon
description: A tough, metallic Gmon with unparalleled defense, perfect for stalling enemies.

name: Skymon
description: Skymon excels in agility and can swoop down on enemies with devastating aerial attacks.

name: Frostmon
description: Frostmon summons a snowstorm that hinders all foes and damages them with freezing winds.

name: Toximon
description: Toximon's venomous nature makes it dangerous, slowly weakening opponents with toxic fumes.

name: Terramon
description: Terramon controls the earth beneath it, shaking the ground to disrupt and damage foes.

name: Luminmon
description: Luminmon uses light to heal and enhance its team, radiating a sense of positivity.

name: Ironmon
description: Ironmon is heavy-duty and resilient, using its iron claws to land heavy blows.

name: Pyromon
description: Pyromon uses intense fire attacks to scorch enemies and leave them with burns.

name: Venommon
description: Venommon uses its toxic attacks to break down enemies' defenses while slowly poisoning them.
